Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.map

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.map.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Class that represents a board, which contains 25 cells in a 5x5 map

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int DIM  
    Cell[][] map  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Constructor of the board, that builds up cell-by-cell the whole map

    boolean build​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player, Cell cellToBuildUp)
    Method that makes the worker build on the chosen cell
    void clean()
    Method that cleans off the entire map, setting the default level of each cell to ground and removing every pawn
    Board clone()
    Method that clones the board of the game that is being played

    Method that gets the 8 cells around the one passed as parameter

    int getLength()  
    java.util.List<Cell> getPossibleBuilds​(Cell cell)
    Method that gets then cell where the player can build It takes all the cells around the given cell and removes the one where the player cannot build, that are the ones that are occupied by a worker or have a dome
    java.util.List<Cell> getPossibleMoves​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player)
    Method that gets then cell where the player can move to It takes all the cells around the current location and removes the one where the player cannot move, considering all rules of moving and possible maluses
    java.util.List<Cell> getRow​(int row)

    Method that gets all the special builds that can be activated by some God powers, where around cell are busy from other players' workers

    Method that gets all the special moves that can be activated by some Gods
    boolean move​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player, Cell newCell)
    Method that makes the worker move to the chosen cell, through an operation of undecorate-decorate

    • getSpecialMoves

      public java.util.List<Cell> getSpecialMoves​(Cell cell, it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player, it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.powers.tags.Timing timing)
      Method that gets all the special moves that can be activated by some Gods
      Parameters:
      cell - Cell from which the cells for special moves are calculated
      player - Player who can make the eventual special move
      timing - Timing that depends from the God
      Returns:
      list of cells where a special move is possible

    • getPossibleMoves

      public java.util.List<Cell> getPossibleMoves​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player)
      Method that gets then cell where the player can move to It takes all the cells around the current location and removes the one where the player cannot move, considering all rules of moving and possible maluses
      Parameters:
      player - Player that has to move
      Returns:
      list of cells where the player can move

    • getPossibleBuilds

      public java.util.List<Cell> getPossibleBuilds​(Cell cell)
      Method that gets then cell where the player can build It takes all the cells around the given cell and removes the one where the player cannot build, that are the ones that are occupied by a worker or have a dome
      Parameters:
      cell - Cell from which it calculates the possible builds
      Returns:
      list of cells where the player can build

    • move

      public boolean move​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player, Cell newCell)
      Method that makes the worker move to the chosen cell, through an operation of undecorate-decorate
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is requiring the move
      newCell - Cell where the worker wants to be moved
      Returns:
      true if the worker is moved properly, false if the action wasn't possible

    • build

      public boolean build​(it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player player, Cell cellToBuildUp)
      Method that makes the worker build on the chosen cell
      Parameters:
      player - Player that is requiring the build
      cellToBuildUp - Cell where the worker wants to build
      Returns:
      true if the build is made properly, false if the action wasn't possible

    • clean

      public void clean()
      Method that cleans off the entire map, setting the default level of each cell to ground and removing every pawn
